faculties.name: Faculty of Computer Science
faculties.description: The Faculty of Computer Science offers a wide range of computer science programs and research opportunities.
faculties.history: Founded in 1985, the Faculty of Computer Science has a rich history of academic excellence.

faculties.name: Faculty of Automation
faculties.description: The Faculty of Automation specializes in automation engineering and robotics.
faculties.history: Established in 1990, the Faculty of Automation has a strong tradition of innovation.

faculties.name: Faculty of Neural Networks
faculties.description: The Faculty of Neural Networks focuses on neural network research and artificial intelligence.
faculties.history: Founded in 2001, the Faculty of Neural Networks is a leader in AI education and research.
